reference.title: eulb-apply-security-groups-to-lb
reference.shortdesc: Associate one or more security groups with a load balancer. All previous associations with security groups will be replaced. [VPC only]

section.title: Syntax
section.codeblock: eulb-apply-security-groups-to-lb -g GROUP1,GROUP2,... [--show-empty-fields] [--region USER@REGION | -U URL] [-I KEY_ID] [-S KEY] [--debug] [--debugger] [--version] [-h] ELB

row.entry: Security groups to associate the load balancer with
Name of the load balancer to modify

section.title: Output
section.p: Eucalyptus does not return any output.

section.title: Example
section.p: The following example applies the euca-admin security group to the MyLoadBalancer elastic load balancer.
